TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HotSpot extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class HotSpot Implements IStateManager
public ref class HotSpot abstract : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 实现所有作用点形状共有的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality common to all hot spot shapes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能直接创建抽象类的实例。You cannot directly create instances of the abstract class. 相反, 此类由、 和类继承, 以提供常见的作用点基本功能。Instead, this class is inherited by the , , and classes to provide the common basic functionality for a hot spot. 您必须从类派生, 以创建表示您定义的唯一形状的自定义热点类。You must derive from the class to create a custom hot spot class that represents a unique shape that you define. 但是, 您可以使用、 和类定义大多数形状。However, you can define most shapes using the , , and classes. 单击 控件中的时, 页面导航到 URL, 生成到服务器的回发, 或不执行任何操作。When a in an control is clicked, the page either navigates to a URL, generates a postback to the server, or does nothing. 属性指定此行为。The property specifies this behavior. 若要导航到 URL, 请将属性设置`HotSpotMode.Navigate`为。To navigate to a URL, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. 使用属性指定要导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要回发到服务器, 请将属性设置`HotSpotMode.PostBack`为。To post back to the server, set the property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`. 使用属性指定对象的名称。 Use the property to specify a name for the object. 单击该 对象时, 此名称将在事件数据中传递。This name will be passed in the event data when the object is clicked. 如果希望对象没有任何行为, 请将属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。If you want the object to have no behavior set the property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. 或者, 可以使用包含 控件上的属性来指定对象的行为。Alternately, you can use the property on the containing control to specify a object's behavior. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

para.span: 当从 继承时，必须重写下面的成员： 和 。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: and .

summary.span: 获取或设置使您可以快速导航至 区域的访问键。

span.span: Gets or sets the access key that allows you to quickly navigate to the region.

value.span: 用于快速导航至 区域的访问键。

span.span: The access key for quick navigation to the region.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可以指定区域的键盘快捷方式。 Use the property to specify the keyboard shortcut for a region. 这使你可以通过按 ALT 键和键盘上指定字符的键来快速导航到该区域。This allows you to navigate quickly to the region by pressing the ALT key and the key for the specified character on the keyboard. 例如, 如果将某个区域的访问键设置为字符串 "D", 则表示用户可以通过按 ALT + D 导航到该控件。For example, setting the access key of a region to the string "D" indicates that the user can navigate to the control by pressing ALT+D. 对于属性, 只允许一个字符串。Only a single character string is allowed for the property. 如果尝试将此属性设置为既`null`不是、 , 也不是单字符字符串的值, 则会引发异常。If you attempt to set this property to a value that is neither `null`, , nor a single character string, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 只有 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更高版本支持此属性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

exception.span: 指定的访问键不是 、空字符串 ("") 也不是单字符字符串。

span.span: The specified access key is neither , an empty string (""), nor a single character string.
ImageMap Web Server Control

summary.span: 获取或设置替换文字，该替换文字在图像不可用或是呈现到不支持图像的浏览器时在 控件中代替 对象显示。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text to display for a object in an control when the image is unavailable or renders to a browser that does not support images.

value.span: 当 控件的图像不可用时，代替 显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed in place of the when the control's image is unavailable.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性指定 的图像不可用时, 可以使用属性指定要在控件中为对象显示的文本。 Use the property to specify the text to display for a object in an control when the image specified by the property is unavailable. 当控件呈现到不支持图像的浏览器时, 它将呈现控件中每个的超链接, 而不是显示图像。 When an control is rendered to a browser that does not support images, instead of displaying an image, it renders a hyperlink for each in the control. 控件从每个的属性检索为每个超链接显示的文本。The control retrieves the text to display for each hyperlink from the property for each . 当用户单击某个超链接时, 它的行为类似于导航到指定的 URL、生成到服务器的回发或不执行任何操作。When a user clicks one of the hyperlinks, it behaves like a by either navigating to a specified URL, generating a postback to the server, or doing nothing. 当控件呈现到支持工具提示功能的浏览器时, 属性的值将显示为的工具提示。 When the control renders to a browser that supports the ToolTips feature, the value of the property is displayed as a ToolTip for the . 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode HotSpotMode { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode HotSpotMode
Public Overridable Property HotSpotMode As HotSpotMode

member this.HotSpotMode : System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件中的 对象时 的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the behavior of a object in an control when the is clicked.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击时 , 使用属性指定控件在控件中的行为。Use the property to specify the behavior of a object in an control when the is clicked. 使用枚举值之一设置此属性。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`| 使用由 控件的 属性设置的行为。The uses the behavior set by the control's property. 如果控件未定义行为, 则对象将导航到 URL。 If the control does not define the behavior, the objects navigate to a URL.| |`Inactive`| 不具有任何行为。The does not have any behavior.| |`Navigate`| 定位到 URL。The navigates to a URL.| |`PostBack`| 生成到服务器的回发。The generates a postback to the server.| 可以在控件的属性或每个单独的对象的属性上指定行为。You can specify behavior on either the property of the control or on the property of each individual object. 如果同时设置了这两个属性, 则每个对象上指定的属性将优先于控件上的属性。If both properties are set, the property specified on each individual object takes precedence over the property on the control. 如果`HotSpotMode.NotSet` 为单个对象的属性指定, 则将从包含控件的属性中获取其行为。 If you specify `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for the property of an individual object, the gets its behavior from the containing control's property. 在这种情况下, 如果控件的属性未设置为值或设置为`HotSpotMode.NotSet`, 则默认行为是导航到 URL。In this scenario, if the control's property is either not set to a value or is set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet`, the default behavior is to navigate to a URL. 如果`HotSpotMode.Navigate` 为对象的属性指定, 则在单击作用点区域时, 对象会导航到 URL。 If you specify `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for the property of a object, the object navigates to a URL when the hot spot region is clicked. 使用属性指定要导航到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 如果`HotSpotMode.PostBack` 为对象的属性指定, 则在单击时, 对象将生成回发到服务器的。 If you specify `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for the property of a object, the object generates a post back to the server when the is clicked. 使用属性指定的名称。 Use the property to specify a name for the . 当发生回发事件时, 将在事件数据中传递此名称。This name will be passed in the event data on when a postback event occurs. 当单击回发时 , 将引发事件。When a postback is clicked, the event is raised. 若要以编程方式控制在单击回发时执行的操作, 请为事件提供事件处理程序。To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 若要使 控件中的所有对象都具有相同的行为, 请将每个对象的属性`HotSpotMode.NotSet`设置为或不指定属性的值。To cause all objects in an control to have the same behavior, set the property on each individual object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the property. 若要为控件中的对象指定不同的行为, 请将每个单独对象的`HotSpotMode.Navigate`属性`HotSpotMode.PostBack`设置为`HotSpotMode.Inactive`、或。To specify different behaviors for objects in an control, set the property on each individual object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, or `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. > [!NOTE] > `HotSpotMode.Navigate` 如果控件的属性或它所包含的对象的属性未设置为值, 或者设置为`HotSpotMode.NotSet`, 则默认情况下该行为是。 If an control's property or the property on the objects it contains is either not set to a value or set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet`, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`. 如果`HotSpotMode.Inactive` 为属性指定, 则在单击对象时, 该对象不会有任何行为。 If you specify `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for the property, the object does not have any behavior when it is clicked. 您可以使用此值在较大的活动作用点内创建非活动热点。You can use this value to create an inactive hot spot within a larger active hot spot. 提供此选项是为了使你能够在控件内创建更复杂的作用点区域。This option is provided to allow you to create more complex hot-spot zones within an control. 若要在活动作用点内创建非活动区域, 必须在控件中的活动作用点之前指定非活动作用点。To create an inactive area within an active hot spot, you must specify the inactive hot spot before the active hot spot in the control. 例如, 以下内容通过在较大的活动循环作用点中指定非活动的循环作用点来定义活动环:For example, the following defines an active ring by specifying an inactive circular hot spot within a larger active circular hot spot: ``` ```

exception.span: 指定的类型不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 将 对象以前保存的视图状态还原到该对象。

span.span: Restores the object's previously saved view state to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用, 不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过, 控件开发人员可以重写此方法, 以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 当从类派生自定义实现时, 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 此方法从方法保存的上一个页请求还原对象的视图状态信息。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

span.span: ImageMap Web Server Control
ASP.NET State Management Overview

summary.span: 自页回发到服务器开始，将更改保存到 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object's view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 对象的视图状态更改的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the object's view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该对象关联的视图状态，此方法将返回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员主要由控件开发人员从类派生自定义实现时使用。 The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的属性中, 该属性是类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后, 将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control's life cycle. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[IIS 5.0 和6.0 的 ASP.NET 应用程序生命周期概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Application Life Cycle Overview for IIS 5.0 and 6.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/de0d8a1c-b1bc-48e1-b246-26e32289a82f). 保存视图状态时, 此字符串对象将作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 输入元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 创作自定义服务器控件时, 可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的`ViewState`属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ImageMap Web Server Control
ASP.NET State Management Overview

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 对象是否跟踪其视图状态更改。

span.span: if a object is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 应使用成员确定对象是否正在跟踪视图状态更改。Typically, you should use the member to determine whether a object is tracking view-state changes. 成员是显式接口成员实现。The member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在实例被强制转换为接口时使用。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定义用于跟踪对象的视图状态的自定义实现, 请重写该成员。

para.span: 显式接口实现调用属性来确定对象是否正在跟踪视图状态更改。

span.span: Restores the object's previously saved view state to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 应使用成员还原对象的视图状态。Typically, you should use the member to restore the view state for a object. 成员是显式接口成员实现。The member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在实例被强制转换为接口时使用。It can be used only when a instance is cast to an interface.

para.span: 若要定义用于还原对象的视图状态的自定义实现, 请重写该成员。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual short TabIndex { get; set; }
.property instance int16 TabIndex
Public Overridable Property TabIndex As Short
public: virtual property short TabIndex { short get(); void set(short value); };
member this.TabIndex : int16 with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 区域的选项卡索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab index of the region.
The tab index of the region.

value.span: 默认值为 0，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定或确定 Web 窗体页上某个区域的选项卡索引。 Use the property to specify or determine the tab index of a region on the Web Forms page. 按 tab 键时, Web 服务器控件接收焦点的顺序取决于每个控件的属性。When you press the TAB key, the order in which the Web server controls receive focus is determined by the property of each control. 最初加载页面时, 按 TAB 键时获得焦点的第一项是地址栏。When a page is initially loaded, the first item that receives focus when the TAB key is pressed is the address bar. 接下来, Web 窗体页上的控件将根据每个控件的属性的值以升序排列, 从最小的非零值开始。Next, the controls on the Web Forms page are tabbed to in ascending order, based on the value of the property of each control, starting with the smallest positive, nonzero value. 如果多个控件共享同一个选项卡索引, 则这些控件将按其在 Web 窗体页上的声明顺序接收焦点。If multiple controls share the same tab index, the controls will receive focus in the order they are declared on the Web Forms page. 最后, 选项卡索引为零的控件按其声明顺序排列。Finally, controls that have a tab index of zero are tabbed to in the order they are declared. > [!NOTE] > 只有具有非零选项卡索引的控件将`tabindex`呈现属性。Only controls with a nonzero tab index will render the `tabindex` attribute. 您可以通过将属性设置为负值来从 tab 键顺序中删除区域。You can remove a region from the tab order by setting the property to a negative value. > [!NOTE] > 只有 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更高版本支持此属性。This property is supported only in Internet Explorer 4.0 and later.

exception.span: 指定的选项卡索引不在 -32768 和 32767 之间。

span.span: The specified tab index is not between -32768 and 32767.
ImageMap Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Overridable Property Target As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，单击导航至 URL 的 对象时在其中显示链接到的网页内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content linked to when a object that navigates to a URL is clicked.

value.span: 目标窗口或框架，单击导航至 URL 的 对象时在其中加载链接到的网页。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a object that navigates to a URL is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定在单击导航到 URL 的对象时显示链接到的网页的框架或窗口。 Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when a object that navigates to a URL is clicked. 仅当属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Navigate`时, 此属性才会有效果, 以导航到 URL。This property has an effect only when the property is set to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, to navigate to a URL. 如果未设置此属性, 则在单击该对象时, 将刷新带有焦点的浏览器或窗口。If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the object is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现`target`为属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. 不`target`允许在 XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中使用定位点元素的属性。The `target` attribute on ANCHOR elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果的 呈现输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1, 请不要设置属性。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > [!CAUTION] > 我们强烈建议在创建可访问的网页时, 避免使用属性来面向其他窗口。We strongly recommend that, when creating accessible Web pages, you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [NIB：ASP.NET 可](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)访问性。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 值必须以 a 到 Z 的字母 (不区分大小写) 开头, 但以下特殊值除外, 后者以下划线开头。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目标值Target value|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine whether the `_search` value is supported. 例如, Internet Explorer 5.0 或更高版本支持`_search`目标值。For example, Internet Explorer 5.0 or later supports the `_search` target value.

summary.span: 返回 对象的此实例的 表示形式。

span.span: Returns the representation of this instance of a object.

returns.span: 表示此 对象的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个表示当前对象的字符串。 The method returns a string that represents the current object. 例如, 如果当前是类的一个实例, 则调用此方法将返回字符串 "CircleHotSpot"。For example, if the current is an instance of the class, calling this method returns the string "CircleHotSpot".

summary.span: 使 对象跟踪对其视图状态所做的更改，以便可以将这些更改存储在该对象的 对象中。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so they can be stored in the object's object.

summary.span: 通过 属性可访问此对象。

span.span: This object is accessible through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员主要由控件开发人员从类派生自定义实现时使用。 The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 当初始化对象时, ASP.NET 会自动调用此方法。This method is called automatically by ASP.NET when the object is initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Web.UI.StateBag ViewState { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.StateBag ViewState
Protected ReadOnly Property ViewState As StateBag
protected: property System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ ViewState { System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ get(); };
member this.ViewState : System.Web.UI.StateBag

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 包含 区域的视图状态信息的 类的实例。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the region's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员主要由控件开发人员从类派生自定义实现时使用。 The member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the class. 服务器控件的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 为了跨 HTTP 请求保留这些值, ASP.NET 服务器控件使用属性 ( 类的实例) 来存储属性值。In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use the property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 然后, 在处理后续请求时, 这些值将作为变量传递给隐藏的 HTML 元素。The values are then passed as a variable to a hidden HTML element when subsequent requests are processed. 有关保存服务器控件视图状态的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 默认情况下, 将为所有服务器控件启用视图状态, 但在某些情况下, 你将需要禁用该状态。View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances in which you will want to disable it. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 性能概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 有关字典以及如何使用它们的信息, 请参阅[集合和数据结构](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md)。For information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md).

span.span: ImageMap Web Server Control
